title: Looking for gold top or middle lane
body:
1. Hey hows it going =D i am currently trying to find a solid top/mid that understands the game and is looking to climb! Looking for dedication and someone that does not go on a emotional tilt easily. Link your Oce.gg in the comments and we can start from there, i currently have 2 gold account and 3 silver.... I am doing my placements on my main account and this is the reason to why i am looking for a confident player. Thanks for taking the time to read =P My recent account http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=chaotix9698 {{champion:43}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:1}} 
 Please have Skype/TeamSpeak/Curse i have them all {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
Hey man you profile looks "interesting" I would love you duo with you, Plat 5.
Mid/sup main.
IGN: Kat to plat.
Is it strictly Gold or at least Gold?
I am more looking for someone with a nice win ratio Skype/Teamspeak sorry i didnt add this in the information but yes being gold would be nice
